changeSet.sql: create view v_model_biz as SELECT v.run_id, max( CASE WHEN p.name::text = 'businessObjectClass'::text THEN v.value ELSE NULL::text END) AS businessobjectclass, max( CASE WHEN p.name::text = 'businessObjectId'::text THEN v.value ELSE NULL::text END) AS businessobjectid FROM aimodelvalues v JOIN aimodelparams p ON p.id = v.aimodelparam_id GROUP BY v.run_id;
